languages.text: {n}Лоб капитана Саргоны покрывает испарина, а роскошный камзол пестрит подпалинами. Его рука лежит на рукояти активатора {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп-двигателя{/g}.{/n} "Что, фон Валанциус, думаешь, победил{mf||а}? Советую подумать еще раз — последний козырь все еще при мне".

{n}Sargona's forehead is covered in sweat, and his expensive jacket is mottled with burn marks. His hands are in constant movement as he works the controls for the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp engine{/g}.{/n} "So, von Valancius, you think you have won? Think again — I still have one last card to play."
languages.original_text: {n}Лоб капитана Саргоны покрывает испарина, а роскошный камзол пестрит подпалинами. Его рука лежит на рукояти активатора {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп-двигателя{/g}.{/n} "Что, фон Валанциус, думаешь, победил{mf||а}? Советую подумать еще раз — последний козырь все еще при мне".

traits.locale_text: {n}Sargona's forehead is covered in sweat, and his expensive jacket is mottled with burn marks. He has his hand on the warp engine starter.{/n} "So, von Valancius, you think you have won? Think again — I still have one last card to play."

{n}Sargona's forehead is covered in sweat, and his expensive jacket is mottled with burn marks. He has his hand on the warp engine starter.{/n} "So, von Valancius, you think you have won? Think again — I still have one last card to play."

{n}Sargona's forehead is covered in sweat, and his expensive jacket is mottled with burn marks. His hands are in constant movement as he works the controls for the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp engine{/g}.{/n} "So, von Valancius, you think you have won? Think again — I still have one last card to play."

{n}Sargona's forehead is covered in sweat, and his expensive jacket is mottled with burn marks. His hands are in constant movement as he works the controls for the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp engine{/g}.{/n} "So, von Valancius, you think you have won? Think again — I still have one last card to play."

languages.text: {n}La frente de Sargona está cubierta de sudor y su chaqueta cara, de quemaduras. No para de mover las manos, manejando los controles del {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}motor de disformidad{/g}.{/n} «¿Te crees que has ganado, von Valancius? No lo tengas tan claro. Aún me queda un as en la manga».
languages.original_text: {n}Sargona's forehead is covered in sweat, and his expensive jacket is mottled with burn marks. His hands are in constant movement as he works the controls for the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp engine{/g}.{/n} "So, von Valancius, you think you have won? Think again — I still have one last card to play."

traits.locale_text: {n}La frente de Sargona está cubierta de sudor y su chaqueta cara, de quemaduras. No para de mover las manos, manejando los controles del {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}motor de disformidad{/g}.{/n} «¿Te crees que has ganado, von Valancius? No lo tengas tan claro. Aún me queda un as en la manga».

languages.text: {n}萨戈纳额头上满是汗渍，昂贵的夹克上布满了烧过的痕迹。他的手一刻不停地操作着，试图启动{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间引擎{/g}。{/n}“怎么了，冯·瓦兰修斯？莫非你以为你赢了？再好好想想吧，我还有一张底牌没打呢。”
languages.original_text: {n}Sargona's forehead is covered in sweat, and his expensive jacket is mottled with burn marks. His hands are in constant movement as he works the controls for the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp engine{/g}.{/n} "So, von Valancius, you think you have won? Think again — I still have one last card to play."

traits.locale_text: {n}萨戈纳额头上满是汗渍，昂贵的夹克上布满了烧过的痕迹。他的手一刻不停地操作着，试图启动{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间引擎{/g}。{/n}“怎么了，冯·瓦兰修斯？莫非你以为你赢了？再好好想想吧，我还有一张底牌没打呢。”
{n}萨戈纳的额头上满是汗渍，昂贵的夹克上布满了烧过的痕迹。他将手搭在{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间引擎{/g}的启动拉杆上。{/n}“怎么了，冯·瓦兰修斯？莫非你以为你赢了？再好好想想吧，我还有一张底牌没打呢。”

languages.text: {n}Le front de Sargona est couvert de sueur, et sa veste luxueuse est piquetée de traces de brûlure. Ses mains courent sans relâche sur les commandes du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}moteur Warp{/g}.{/n} « Eh bien, von Valancius, vous croyez avoir gagné la partie ? Détrompez-vous... Il me reste une dernière carte à jouer. »
languages.original_text: {n}Sargona's forehead is covered in sweat, and his expensive jacket is mottled with burn marks. His hands are in constant movement as he works the controls for the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp engine{/g}.{/n} "So, von Valancius, you think you have won? Think again — I still have one last card to play."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le front de Sargona est couvert de sueur, et sa veste luxueuse est piquetée de traces de brûlure. Ses mains courent sans relâche sur les commandes du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}moteur Warp{/g}.{/n} « Eh bien, von Valancius, vous croyez avoir gagné la partie ? Détrompez-vous... Il me reste une dernière carte à jouer. »

languages.text: {n}サルゴナの額が汗で覆われ、彼の高価なジャケットが焼けてまだらになっている。彼の手は絶えず動き続けて、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}ワープエンジン{/g}を操作している。{/n}「さて、フォン・ヴァランシウス、お前は勝ったと思うか？もう一度考えてみろ。私にはまだプレイできる最後のカードが一枚ある」
languages.original_text: {n}Sargona's forehead is covered in sweat, and his expensive jacket is mottled with burn marks. His hands are in constant movement as he works the controls for the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp engine{/g}.{/n} "So, von Valancius, you think you have won? Think again — I still have one last card to play."

traits.locale_text: {n}サルゴナの額が汗で覆われ、彼の高価なジャケットが焼けてまだらになっている。彼の手は絶えず動き続けて、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}ワープエンジン{/g}を操作している。{/n}「さて、フォン・ヴァランシウス、お前は勝ったと思うか？もう一度考えてみろ。私にはまだプレイできる最後のカードが一枚ある」
{n}サルゴナの額が汗で覆われ、彼の高価なジャケットが焼けてまだらになっている。{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}ワープエンジン{/g}起動装置に彼の手がかかっている。{/n}「さて、フォン・ヴァランシウス、お前は勝ったと思うか？もう一度考えてみろ―私にはまだプレーできる最後のカードが一枚ある」

languages.text: {n}Sargona'nın alnından terler damlıyor, pahalı ceketi ise yanık lekeleriyle kaplı. Eli kıpırdanıp duruyor, {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut motorunun{/g} kontrolünü sağlamaya çalışıyor.{/n} "Kazandığını mı sanıyorsun von Valancius? Tekrar düşün. Oynayacak son bir kartım daha var."
languages.original_text: {n}Sargona's forehead is covered in sweat, and his expensive jacket is mottled with burn marks. His hands are in constant movement as he works the controls for the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp engine{/g}.{/n} "So, von Valancius, you think you have won? Think again — I still have one last card to play."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sargona'nın alnından terler damlıyor, pahalı ceketi ise yanık lekeleriyle kaplı. Eli kıpırdanıp duruyor, {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut motorunun{/g} kontrolünü sağlamaya çalışıyor.{/n} "Kazandığını mı sanıyorsun von Valancius? Tekrar düşün. Oynayacak son bir kartım daha var."

{n}Sargona'nın alnından terler damlıyor, pahalı ceketi ise yanık lekeleriyle kaplı. Eli, {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut motorunun{/g} çalıştırma düğmesi üzerinde bekliyor.{/n} "Kazandığını mı sanıyorsun von Valancius? Tekrar düşün. Oynayacak son bir kartım daha var."

languages.text: {n}Sargonas Stirn ist schweißbedeckt, seine teure Jacke voller Brandflecken. Seine Hände sind in ständiger Bewegung, während er die Steuerung des {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp-Triebwerks{/g} bedient.{/n} "So, von Valancius, Ihr denkt, Ihr habt gewonnen? Falsch gedacht ... einen letzten Trumpf habe ich noch."
languages.original_text: {n}Sargona's forehead is covered in sweat, and his expensive jacket is mottled with burn marks. His hands are in constant movement as he works the controls for the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp engine{/g}.{/n} "So, von Valancius, you think you have won? Think again — I still have one last card to play."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sargonas Stirn ist schweißbedeckt, seine teure Jacke voller Brandflecken. Seine Hände sind in ständiger Bewegung, während er die Steuerung des {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp-Triebwerks{/g} bedient.{/n} "So, von Valancius, Ihr denkt, Ihr habt gewonnen? Falsch gedacht ... einen letzten Trumpf habe ich noch."
